meanings.definition: A belt or sash worn over the shoulder to support a sword or bugle.
meanings.sent1: The knight proudly displayed his shiny bawdric holding his sword.
meanings.sent2: She carefully adjusted the bawdric to ensure the sword was secure.
meanings.sent3: The bawdric looked like a colorful ribbon holding up the sword.
meanings.sent4: His bawdric was a symbol of his bravery and readiness for battle.
meanings.sent5: The bawdric gleamed in the sunlight, drawing attention to the sword it carried.

meanings.sent3: They bawdriced the sword playfully, pretending to be knights.
meanings.sent4: The soldier bawdrics his gear before heading out for duty.
meanings.sent5: Bawdricking the bugle added a touch of tradition to the event.
